verses.roman:
sannyāsa kariyā āmi calilāṅ vṛndāvana
tumi āmā lañā āile advaita-bhavana

synonyms: sannyāsa kariyā—after accepting the renounced order; āmi—I; calilāṅ—went; vṛndāvana—toward Vṛndāvana; tumi—You; āmā—Me; lañā—taking; āile—went; advaita-bhavana—to the house of Advaita Prabhu.
translation: "After accepting the sannyāsa order, I decided to go to Vṛndāvana, but You took Me instead to the house of Advaita Prabhu.
